validator registration.","publicKey":"The public key that the validator is using for consensus, should match  msg.sender.","url":"A URL for the validator."},"return":"True upon It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore."},"reorderMember(address,address,address)":{"details":"Fails if `validator` is not a member of the account's 0 if `validator` will be the  last member.","validator":"The validator to reorder."},"return":"True upon success."},"revokeVote(address,address)":{"details":"Fails if the account has not voted on a receiving fewer votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the fewest votes of any validator group."},"return":"True upon success."},"setMaxElectableValidators(uint256)":{"params":{"_maxElectableValidators":"The maximum number of validators that can be elected."},"return":"True upon nodes.name: dHondt

addMember(address).details: Fails if `validator` has not set their affiliation to this account.

params.validator: The validator to add to the group

affiliate(address).details: De-affiliates with the previously affiliated group if present.

params.group: The validator group with which to affiliate.

deaffiliate().details: Fails if the account is not a validator with non-zero affiliation.

deregisterValidator(uint256).details: Fails if the account is not a validator.

params.index: The index of this validator in the list of all validators.

deregisterValidatorGroup(uint256).details: Fails if the account is not a validator group with no members.

params.index: The index of this validator group in the list of all validator groups.

getRegisteredValidatorGroups().return: The list of registered validator group addresses.

getRegisteredValidators().return: The list of registered validator accounts.

getRegistrationRequirement().return: The minimum value and notice period for the bonded deposit.

params.account: The account that registered the validator.
The account that registered the validator group.

getValidatorGroupVotes().return: Electable validator group addresses and their vote totals.

params.group: The account that registered the validator group.

getVotesReceived(address).return: The number of votes a particular validator group has received.

params._maxElectableValidators: The maximum number of validators that can be elected.
params._minElectableValidators: The minimum number of validators that can be elected.
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry contract.
params.requirementNoticePeriod: The minimum bonded deposit notice period to register a group or  validator.
params.requirementValue: The minimum bonded deposit value to register a group or validator.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

isValidating(address).return: Whether a particular account is a registered validator or validator group.

isValidator(address).return: Whether a particular address is a registered validator.

isValidatorGroup(address).return: Whether a particular address is a registered validator group.

isVoting(address).return: Whether a particular account is voting for a validator group.

params.noticePeriod: The notice period of the bonded deposit that meets the requirements.

meetsRegistrationRequirements(address,ui.return: Whether an account meets the requirements to register a validator or group.

registerValidator(string,string,string,b.details: Fails if the account is already a validator or validator group.Fails if the account does not have sufficient weight.

params.name: A name for the validator.
params.noticePeriod: The notice period of the bonded deposit that meets the requirements for  validator registration.
params.publicKey: The public key that the validator is using for consensus, should match  msg.sender.

registerValidatorGroup(string,string,str.details: Fails if the account is already a validator or validator group.Fails if the account does not have sufficient weight.

params.identifier: A identifier for this validator group.
params.name: A name for the validator group.
params.noticePeriod: The notice period of the bonded deposit that meets the requirements for  validator registration.
params.url: A URL for the validator group.

removeMember(address).details: Fails if `validator` is not a member of the account's group.

params.validator: The validator to remove from the group

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

reorderMember(address,address,address).details: Fails if `validator` is not a member of the account's validator group.

params.greaterMember: The member who will be ahead of `validator`, or 0 if `validator` will be  the first member.
params.lesserMember: The member who will be behind `validator`, or 0 if `validator` will be the  last member.

revokeVote(address,address).details: Fails if the account has not voted on a validator group.

params.greater: The group receiving more votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the most votes of any validator group.
params.lesser: The group receiving fewer votes than the group for which the vote was revoked,  or 0 if that group has the fewest votes of any validator group.

params._maxElectableValidators: The maximum number of validators that can be elected.

params._minElectableValidators: The minimum number of validators that can be elected.

setRegistrationRequirement(uint256,uint2.details: The new requirement is only enforced for future validator or group registrations.

params.noticePeriod: The minimum bonded deposit notice period to register a group or validator.
params.value: The minimum bonded deposit value to register a group or validator.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

vote(address,address,address).details: Fails if `group` is empty or not a validator group.Fails if the account is frozen.

params.greater: The group receiving more votes than `group`, or 0 if `group` has the  most votes of any validator group.
params.group: The validator group to vote for.
params.lesser: The group receiving fewer votes than `group`, or 0 if `group` has the  fewest votes of any validator group.

devdoc.title: A contract for registering and electing Validator Groups and Validators.

addMember(address).notice: Adds a member to the end of a validator group's list of members.

affiliate(address).notice: Affiliates a validator with a group, allowing it to be added as a member.

deaffiliate().notice: De-affiliates a validator, removing it from the group for which it is a member.

deregisterValidator(uint256).notice: De-registers a validator, removing it from the group for which it is a member.

getRegisteredValidatorGroups().notice: Returns the list of registered validator group accounts.

getRegisteredValidators().notice: Returns the list of registered validator accounts.

getRegistrationRequirement().notice: Returns the bonded deposit requirements to register a validator or group.

getValidatorGroupVotes().notice: Returns electable validator group addresses and their vote totals.

getValidators().notice: Returns a list of elected validators with seats allocated to groups via the D'Hondt  method.

getVotesReceived(address).notice: Returns the number of votes a particular validator group has received.

isValidating(address).notice: Returns whether a particular account is a registered validator or validator group.

isValidator(address).notice: Returns whether a particular account has a registered validator.

isValidatorGroup(address).notice: Returns whether a particular account has a registered validator group.

isVoting(address).notice: Returns whether a particular account is voting for a validator group.

meetsRegistrationRequirements(address,ui.notice: Returns whether an account meets the requirements to register a validator or group.

registerValidator(string,string,string,b.notice: Registers a validator unaffiliated with any validator group.

registerValidatorGroup(string,string,str.notice: Registers a validator group with no member validators.

removeMember(address).notice: Removes a member from a validator group.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

reorderMember(address,address,address).notice: Reorders a member within a validator group.

revokeVote(address,address).notice: Revokes an outstanding vote for a validator group.

setMaxElectableValidators(uint256).notice: Updates the maximum number of validators that can be elected.

setMinElectableValidators(uint256).notice: Updates the minimum number of validators that can be elected.

setRegistrationRequirement(uint256,uint2.notice: Updates the minimum bonding requirements to register a validator group or validator.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

vote(address,address,address).notice: Casts a vote for a validator group.
